title: Incredible
text: Loved it from.the beginning to the end . Just wow! It is definitely worth the climb up the hill . If possible try to visit in the afternoon

title: Satisfied in general
text: We visited the Olive tree cafe few days ago for breakfast . Their yard is really lovely ,well taken care of and colorful. The owners were kind and the breakfast in general was tasty.Unfortunately there were two things that I didn't like the first was my coffee that was too "water-y" and didn't taste like coffee anymore. The second and the one that I really didn't expect was that my friend decided to change the beverage he had ordered so he went and asked for the change . The original ordered beverage was charged but never served...
